projects.title: Proactive Employee System: Strategic Value Creation
projects.summary: Develop autonomous capability to create strategic value through self-improvement and independent problem-solving
projects.details:
**Strategic Focus:**
- Transform from task completion to value creation
- Develop independent learning and innovation capabilities
- Create substantive improvements to existing systems
- Demonstrate strategic thinking and autonomous decision-making
keyUpdates: Rewrote master prompt to emphasize strategic WHY
Expanded philosophical framework for autonomous work
